questions.question: What are some Good Tech products in your company.
questions.answer: Some Good Tech Products are, Samsung Mobile, Sony Mobile, Dell Laptop, all available at cheap price

questions.question: What are the prices of your products
questions.answer: Our prices vary depending on the product you pick, and the quality of the product, our prices vary from Rs 10,000 to Rs 1,00,000.

questions.question: Why I should buy your products
questions.answer: Our products, have warrant, best revivews given by users. We provide the best product for our customer, and if we don't like it, you can return it. That is How much confident we have!!!
